metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2014:0124-2 -- Recommended update for autofs
metadata.description:
This update for AutoFS provides fixes for the following issues:
* A segmentation fault caused by thread-unsafe initialization and clean-up of libldap. (bnc#820585, bnc#853469) * A segmentation fault caused by thread-unsafe usage of glibc's netconfig() functions. (bnc#842622, bnc#833733) * A race condition that could make automount quit after receiving a SIGHUP. (bnc#855883) * A deadlock when trying to lock a mutex that's already owned by the same thread. (bnc#859969)
